korean: 날씨 예보를 못 봐서 우산을 안 챙겼는데 갑자기 비가 왔다.
집에는 우산이 한 10개는 있는 것 같은데 막상 필요할 때 없다.
다음엔 가방에 작은 우산을 넣어 다녀야겠다.
english: I didn't check the weather forecast and didn't bring an umbrella, then it suddenly rained.
I bought a plastic umbrella at the convenience store.
I think I have about 10 umbrellas at home, but when I need one, I don't have it.
Next time, I should keep a small umbrella in my bag.
